segments.text: No , I shouldn't think so . But you must take your passport of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know . I must get my traveler's check and some foreign currency .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you need the traveler's check but you needn't get any foreign currency . You can have my US Dollars , I don't need them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? That's very good of you , Helen . But I must get a new suitcase , my old one needs repairing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You needn't buy one . You can have mine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very kind of you , Helen . I hope you don't mind my leaving you like this . I need a holiday . It won â€™ t be long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be silly , John . I'm going with you . It's necessary for me to have a holiday too .
segments.speaker: S2
